about_the_game:
Please note: the early access version of the game only contains the first two ages: Antiquity and the Middle Ages. The next two ages, the Renaissance and the Age of Enlightenment, will be made available as the game develops.

  • From Antiquity to the Age of Enlightenment: lay the foundations of your city, experience critical moments in history and transform your city into the Capital of Capital!

  • Each Age introduces its own game mechanics, presenting a distinct set of opportunities and challenges for the player's dynasty to navigate.

  • Traces from one age can be integrated into the next one.

  • No need to worry about laying roads!

  • Thanks to our unique algorithm, overseen by an urban planner, you can create the most realistic-looking city you've ever seen in a video game!

  • Quarters, factions, Age transitions... Your choices will shape your town's future!

  • Your inhabitants will have needs and expectations. Rely on buildings such as farms, cutting camps and quarries to ensure the livelihood of your pioneers.

  • Use your creativity and strategic skills to manage administrative and political centers to interact with your population.

  • Take the Senatus for instance : once built, you can propose and fund decrees, which will impact your city for short periods!

  • Face historical events like the Black Death and manage internal events such as riots and strikes that could lead to losing the game!

  • Build wonders like the Great Library of Alexandria, Windsor Castle, the Leaning Tower of Pisa, the Palace of Versailles and more to showcase your wealth and power throughout the ages!

  • The culture you choose will impact your city and offer significant replayability. Will you choose to be a craftsman, the influence of a politician, the mind of a philosopher, or something else?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD RYZEN 7 5800 X or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Memoriapolis invites you to construct a city that spans 2,500 years of history, from Antiquity to the Age of Enlightenment. Choose your culture, manage resources, face historical events, build "Wonders" to achieve the status of Capital of Capitals and leave your mark in history!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
